4.4.1 The Debug structure

clear

Function

Structure

Shell.Debug

Type

val clear ('a -> 'b) -> unit

Syntax

clear function -> ()

Arguments

function
A function.

Values

()

Description

Clears the debugging information compiled for a function. For internal use only.
